channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Realtime AI video analysis app Lloyd will offer developer kit after passing 50,000 users
item.description: Cost-efficiency is achieved without sacrificing accuracy, setting Lloyd apart from competitors that rely on reduced frame rates or lower res.

item.description: One study noted that it’s “the leading cause of disability in most countries.”

item.title: ServiceTitan raises IPO price on deal demand and appetite for new issuers
item.description: In a big move, ServiceTitan boosted its estimated price range to $65 to $67 a share, from $52 to $57 previously.

item.title: Singapore startup Sapient enters global enterprise AI race with new model architectures
item.description: Central to Sapient’s success is its hybrid architecture that blends transformer components with recurrent neural network structures.

item.title: Dave & Buster’s struggles to capture spending, and CEO exit is a bombshell

item.title: OpenAI’s o1 model doesn’t show its thinking, giving open source an advantage
item.description: o1 does not reveal its reasoning chain, which makes it difficult to get consistent results and correct the model's responses and logic.

item.title: Here’s what one employee hiding money is doing to Macy’s stock and profit view
item.description: Macy’s cut its full-year earnings outlook, after making adjustments to reflect the impact of misstated delivery expenses.

item.title: OpenAI expands ChatGPT Canvas to all users
item.description: Canvas, OpenAI's text and code editor, is now available for all ChatGPT users. It also now lets people run Python code.

item.title: How RapidCanvas automates 70% of data tasks for gen AI projects
item.description: With its context-aware AI agents, RapidCanvas is taking on the likes of leading players like DataRobot, Dataiku, Palantir and Alteryx.
